title: Game Bug causes me to freeze. HALP
body:
Steps that I went through.
1. Entered Queue.
2. Accepted game.
3. Screen DIDN'T go to the champ selection screen. The screen stayed on my previous screen while in the queue.
4. I couldn't select a champ.

Basically, that is the bug.
I have already submitted a bug report.
However, since I didn't select a champ the game deducted I left the game. 
Now, I have a bad record of leaving champ select screens.
I heard that this makes your queue time longer.
I was wondering if any mod or admin could look into this problem and possibly fix my elongated queue time.
THANKS!

replies.body: exact same issue, now i'm sitting on a 30 minute wait to enter que for a bug in the game. Doesn't really seem fair at all to me, especially since multiple people are now having the same issue

There could be a few reasons for this ranging from pc stress, bad game files, or a likely connection problem failing to transition you from champ select to game server.  Let's start off with the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure there are no snags on the way during champion select.

Try [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) as well in case there is some stress causing you to freeze up.

We aren't able to reduce dodge queues, but hopefully these steps help.  You'll want to test it in customs for now to prevent further penalties.
